ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
I intentionally explored my present-moment experience
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I observed my unpleasant emotions without becoming caught up in them
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I felt connected to my experience in the moment
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I noticed my thoughts without judging them
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I experienced the present-moment without preferences or judgments
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I noticed the difference between my thoughts, emotions, and sensations
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I experienced quiet moments when my mind felt light and spacious
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I had a deep feeling of oneness with all that exists
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I noticed a sense of calm in my body
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I was aware of the arising or passing of experiences
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I was kind to myself when things went wrong
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I felt in tune with the emotions of others
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: I paid attention to what was occurring in the moment (e.g., eating, brushing teeth)
Notes: 1 = Not at all; 2 = A little bit; 3 = Somewhat; 4 = Quite a bit; 5 = Very much

ElementDescription: Global Mindfulness Raw Score
Global Mindfulness Score (T-Score)
